sentence.Network_en: She said it almost truculently but she was weeping with fright.
sentence.Network_cn: 她的语气简直有点粗暴,不过她却因为恐惧而哭哭啼啼.

sentence.Network_en: They strive for security by truculently asserting their own interests.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们通过拼命维护自身利益来争取安全保障.

sentence.Network_en: The boy looked up truculently at his teacher.
sentence.Network_cn: 那个男孩挑衅地看着他的老师.
